resources.string: The purpose of the game is to open all the cells of the board which do not contain a bomb. You lose if you set off a bomb cell. (Scroll down ↓) \n \n Every non-bomb cell you open will tell you the total number of bombs in the eight neighboring cells.
If the non-bomb cell is a zero, all the cells that are around it and they contain a zero or a number will be revealed.

If you are sure that a cell contains a bomb, you can long-press on a cell to put a \'flag\' (mini smiley face ☻) on it as a reminder. If you change your mind, you can long tap the cell again and it will turn into ☺.
You can also move through the board swiping up, down, right or left.
If you click a bomb, the game will end and all the board elements will be revealed.
To quit the current game without finishing it, you have to long tap on the right side of the screen and then click \'Quit\'.
